General.Name: Chongqing Constr Engineering
General.Description: Chongqing Construction Engineering Group Corporation Limited engages in construction activities in China. The company engages in housing and infrastructure construction activities. It is also involved in building material production, engineering design, machinery manufacturing, franchising, logistics, and distribution services. In addition, the company offers mechanical, electrical installation, and building decoration activities, as well as constructs and invests highways, road surfaces, bridges, water conservancy, ports, and tunnels. Further, the company produces and sells steel components, as well as involved in technical consultation and services of structures and building materials. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Chongqing, China.
